question: A chef needs to cook 13 potatoes. He has already cooked 5. If each potato takes 6 minutes to cook, how long will it take him to cook the rest?
response:
The chef has already cooked 5 potatoes, which means he has 13 - 5 = 8 potatoes left to cook.
Each potato takes 6 minutes to cook, so the total time to cook all the potatoes is 8 potatoes x 6 minutes per potato = <<8*6=48>>48 minutes.
The answer is 48 minutes.
